query: How to change my profile picture on zoom
column3: I want to change my zoom profile picture
answer:
To access your Zoom profile, sign in to the Zoom web portal and click Profile. You can view and edit the following setting:
Profile Picture: To add or change your profile picture, click Change, then adjust the crop area on your current picture or upload a new one. You can also delete your profile picture by clicking Delete.

query: How to enable recording on zoom
column3: I want to turn on the option for recording on zoom
answer:
Sign in to the Zoom web portal.
Click Settings.
In the Recording tab, navigate to the Local Recording option and verify that the setting is enabled.
If the setting is disabled, click the toggle to enable it. If a verification dialog displays, click Turn On to verify the change.
Note: If the option is grayed out, it has been locked at either the group or account level, and you will need to contact your Zoom administrator.

query: How to record zoom meetings
column3: I want to record a meeting on zoom
answer:
The host must record the meeting or grant the ability to record to a participant.
Start a Zoom meeting as the host.
Click the option to Record.
If there is a menu, select Record on this Computer.
Click Participants to see which participants are currently recording.
Note: Dial-in participants will hear a message informing them that the meeting is now being recorded unless disabled by the host.

After the meeting has ended, Zoom will convert the recording so you can access the files.
Once the conversion process is complete, the folder containing the recording files will open.
Note: By default, the audio/video file (MP4) will be named Zoom_0.mp4. The audio only file (M4A) is named audio_only.m4a.

query: How to turn off chat notifications in zoom
column3: How to mute chat notifications in zoom
answer:
Open Zoom.
Click the Zoom icon in the top-right side of your screen.
Next, click Settings.
Now navigate to the Chat Tab.
Then scroll down to the Push Notifications section. Here you have two helpful choices:
- Select Nothing to dismiss all Zoom chat messages immediately,
- Alternatively, select Only private mentions, to hide all notifications coming from Zoom channels, and receive only those from 1:1 chats.

query: How to upload my own background in zoom
column3: I want to use my own background in zoom
answer:
Open the app and sign in. 
Click your profile picture, then click on Settings.
In the left menu bar, click on the Virtual Background tab (if you don't see this tab, log in to the Zoom website, go to Settings and toggle on Virtual Background).
In the Virtual Background tab, select one of Zoom's defaults or upload your own image.
If you have a green screen set-up, you can select that option.
To add your own image or video, click the + icon to upload from your computer.

query: How to schedule a WebEx meeting
column3: I want to schedule a Cisco WebEx meeting
answer:
Sign in to your Cisco Webex site, click the drop-down arrow next to Schedule a Meeting, and then select Schedule a Meeting.
(Optional) If you have any saved meeting templates, you can select one from the Meeting templates.
Add the basics by providing the following information:
- Meeting type—Meeting types are default or customized sets of meeting features available for your site. Your account can have one or more meeting types associated with it.
- Meeting topic—Choose a topic that people will recognize and get excited about.
- Meeting password—Use the password that's provided or enter your own. Attendees must enter this password to join your meeting.
- Date and time—Indicate when the meeting will take place, keeping in mind the time zones of your attendees. You can also set the meeting to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, and so on, by checking the Recurrence check box.
- Attendees—Enter the email addresses of the people you want to invite to your meeting. If they have an account on this site, you can select  next to their name if you want them to be a cohost.
If your site administrator has enabled Tracking Codes, click Edit tracking code to enter the required information.
Click Show advanced options to customize how people can call into your meeting, add an agenda, and more.
To save these settings as a template for future use, click Save as template.
To start your meeting right away, click Start; if you're meeting later, click Schedule.
For scheduled meetings, you can add the meeting to your calendar by opening the meeting from Meetings > Add to my calendar Add to my calendar. This option appears next to the name of the meeting:
An iCalender (.ics) file downloads. Select the .ics file and accept the meeting. To invite others to your meeting, send the .ics file as an email attachment.

query: How to create breakout rooms in zoom
column3: I want to create breakout rooms in zoom
answer:
Start an instant or scheduled meeting.
Click Breakout Rooms.
Select the number of rooms you would like to create, and how you would like to assign your participants to those rooms:
- Automatically: Let Zoom split your participants up evenly into each of the rooms.
- Manually: Choose which participants you would like in each room.
- Let participants choose room: Participants can select and enter rooms on their own. 
Click Create Breakout Rooms. Your rooms will be created, but will not start automatically.
To assign participants to your rooms, select Assign next to the room you wish to assign participants to and select the participants you want to assign to that room. Repeat this for each room.
Once a participant has been assigned (manually or automatically), the number of participants will show in place of the Assign button.
After manually or automatically assigning participants to rooms, hover over the participant or room and select Open All Rooms

query: How to enable breakout rooms in zoom
column3: I want to be able to use breakout rooms in zoom
answer:
Sign in to the Zoom web portal.
In the navigation menu, click Settings.
Navigate to the Breakout Room option on the Meeting tab and verify that the setting is enabled.
If the setting is disabled, click the toggle to enable it. If a verification dialog displays, choose Turn On to verify the change.

Note: If the option is grayed out, it has been locked at either the Group or Account level, and you will need to contact your Zoom administrator.
(Optional) Click the checkbox to allow meeting hosts to pre-assign participants to breakout rooms.

query: How do I contact Microsoft Teams users from Skype?
column3: I want to call microsoft teams users from skype
answer:
To connect with a Microsoft Teams user in a one-to-one chat or call:
Open the Skype app.
Select Search icon People, groups & messages and enter their business email to search for them.
Select your contact result from PEOPLE and then send them a message.
Note: Only certain chat and call functionality will be available.
After they have accepted your request, they will appear in your contact list.

query: How to join a Microsoft Teams meeting
column3: I want to join a microsoft teams meeting
answer:
All you need to join a Teams meeting is a link.
Select Click here to join the meeting in your meeting invite to be taken to a page where you can choose to either join on the web or download the desktop app. If you already have the Teams app, the meeting will open there automatically.
If you don’t have a Teams account and the organizer has allowed it, you may have the option to enter your name to join the meeting as a guest. If you do have a Teams account, select Sign in to join with access to the meeting chat and more. Then, depending on the organizer’s settings, you may join the meeting right away or go to the lobby where people in the meeting can admit you.

query: How to change my video background in Microsoft Teams
column3: I want to change my background in microsoft teams
answer:
If you want to change what appears behind you in your video, you can either blur your background, or replace it entirely with any image you want.
When you're setting up your audio and video before a meeting, select Background filters Background settings (just below the video image). You'll see your background options on the right. 
Note:  If you don't see the option to turn on background effects, the feature might not be available on your device yet.

query: How to start a call in Microsoft Teams
column3: I want to make a call in microsoft teams
answer:
There are many ways to make a call in Teams
Wherever you are in Teams, you can start a call with someone (or a group of people). Here are some of the ways:

Make or answer a call from anywhere
Select either Video call or Audio call. Any call can be a video call or an audio-only call. It's always up to you. 
Answering a call is simple too. Just select Video call or Audio call when prompted. When someone calls you, you'll get a notification that lets you accept or decline the call.

Turn a chat into a call
With one click, you can make any chat into a call in Teams. When you're in a chat, select Video call or Audio cal in the upper-right corner of Teams. The person you are chatting with (or the people, if it's a group chat) will receive a call from you.  

Make a call from your call history, speed dial, voicemail, or contacts
Access your call history and quickly call anyone back from the list. Go to Calls and review the History section in the center of the screen. Select any item from the list and then choose Call in the Details section on the right side of Teams.
From your speed dial, you can quickly call people that you previously saved to this list. To access your speed dial, go to Calls and then find the Speed dial section on the right side of Teams.
From your voicemail, you can quickly call back anyone who left a message. To access your voicemail, go to History and select the Voicemail button in the upper-right corner. You can call someone back from your voicemail by selecting More actions next to their name > Call back from the call history list, or by clicking Call under the contact details.

To view your contacts, click Calls > Contacts in the upper-left of Teams. From here, you can call anyone by selecting Call to the right of their name.

query: How to schedule a microsoft teams meeting
column3: I want to schedule a meeting in microsoft teams
answer:
There are several ways to schedule a meeting in Teams:
Select Schedule a meeting in a chat (below the box where you type a new message) to book a meeting with the people in the chat.
Go to Calendar on the left side of the app and select New meeting in the top right corner. Select a range of time in the calendar. A scheduling form will pop open.
The scheduling form is where you'll give your meeting a title, invite people, and add meeting details. Use the Scheduling Assistant to find a time that works for everyone.
Once you're done filling out the details, select Save. This will close the scheduling form and send an invite to everyone's Outlook inbox.

query: How to invite people outside your organization to your microsoft teams meeting
column3: I want to invite people to my microsoft teams meeting
answer:
Teams lets you invite people outside your organization, including those who don't have a Teams license. You'll need their full email address to invite them.
Go to where it says Add required attendees. If anyone is an optional attendee, select Optional instead.
Type the person's full email address (ex: Joe@example.com).
Select Invite. They'll receive an email with a link to the meeting.

query: How to start an instant meeting in microsoft teams
column3: I want to start a new meeting in microsoft teams
answer:
Go to Calendar on the left side of Teams, then select Meet now in the upper right corner.
You'll have a chance to set a few things up before you start your meeting. Give it a title, choose whether you want to use video, and pick your preferred audio source.
When you're ready, hit Join now.
Your meeting is now up and running—you just need people to join you. 

To invite people:
Start typing the name or phone number of someone you want to invite in the box under People in the top right. Select them when they appear in the list, and they'll get a call right away
Another option is to copy the meeting link and send it to anyone you want to meet with, and they can join by selecting it. Just choose Copy join info and paste the link in a message.

query: How to share your screen in microsoft teams
column3: I want to share content in microsoft teams
answer:
To share your screen in a meeting, select Share content in your meeting controls. Then, choose to present your entire screen, a window, a PowerPoint file, or a whiteboard.
To share sound, select Include computer sound (it's the switch on the top right of your sharing options). All sound from your computer, including notifications, will be audible in the meeting.
Notes: 
- If you're using Teams on the web, you'll be able to share your screen only if you're using Google Chrome or the latest version of Microsoft Edge.
- If you're using a Mac, you'll need to grant permission to Teams to record your computer's screen before you can share. 
You'll be prompted to grant permission the first time you try to share your screen. Select Open System Preferences from the prompt.
If you miss the prompt, you can do this anytime by going to Apple Menu > System Preferences > Security & Privacy.
Under Screen Recording, make sure Microsoft Teams is selected.
Go back to your meeting and try sharing your screen again.

Note: If you're using Teams on the web, make sure you've also granted screen recording permission to your browser.

query: How to enable live captions in microsoft teams
column3: I want to see captions when someon is speaking in microsoft teams
answer:
Teams can detect what’s said in a meeting and present real-time captions. And, if you've turned on the new meeting experience, your captions will include speaker attribution—so you'll see not only what's being said, but who's saying it. 

To use live captions in a meeting, go to your meeting controls and select More options > Turn on live captions.
To stop using live captions, go to the meeting controls and select More options > Turn off live captions.
Notes: 
Captions are available only in English (US) for now.
People can choose to not be identified in captions.

query: How to record a microsoft teams meeting
column3: I want to record a meeting in microsoft teams
answer:
To start recording, go to the meeting controls and select More options > Start recording and transcription.
Everyone in the meeting is notified that recording and transcription has started. The meeting notification is also posted to the chat history.
Notes: 
You can't make multiple recordings of the same meeting at the same time. If one person starts recording a meeting, that recording will be stored on the cloud and available to all participants.
Meeting participants have the option of viewing the transcription during the meeting.

To stop recording, go to the meeting controls and select More options > Stop recording and transcription.
The recording is then processed and saved to SharePoint if it was a channel meeting, or OneDrive if it was any other type of meeting. 
The meeting recording shows up in the meeting chat—or in the channel conversation, if you’re meeting in a channel. The recording doesn't expire.

query: How to create breakout rooms in microsoft teams
column3: I want to create breakout rooms in microsoft teams
answer:
Start the meeting.
In the meeting controls, select Breakout rooms.
Select the number of rooms you want (50 max), and whether you want Teams to assign people to rooms (Automatically) or you want to choose the people for each room yourself (Manually).
Note: This is the only time you can choose to have people automatically assigned to breakout rooms. You won't be able to change this option later in the meeting.
Select Create Rooms.

query: How to assign people to breakout rooms in microsoft teams
column3: I want to assign participants to breakout rooms in microsoft teams
answer:
Select Assign participants.
Choose the people who will share a breakout room by selecting the check boxes next to their names.
Select Assign and then select a room for those people.
Repeat steps the previous two steps until everyone has been assigned to a room.

query: How to screen share from iPad or iPhone to zoom on computer
column3: I want to share screen on my iphone or ipad in zoom
answer:
In the meeting controls, tap Share Content. The meeting controls will be at the bottom of your screen on an iPhone and the top right of your screen on an iPad.
Tap Screen. Then, swipe left on the instructions to see the Broadcast to Zoom instructions.
Access the Control Center.
- On iPhone 8 or older or iPads running iOS 11, swipe up from the bottom.
- On iPhone X or iPads running iOS 12, swipe down from the top right. 
Hold down on the record button until the Screen Recording option appears.
Then, tap Zoom > Start Broadcast.
After a count of 3, your entire device screen will be shared into the meeting.
Tap the red bar at the top of your screen when you are ready to end the share. Tap Stop. 
Tap the red bar again to open Zoom.

query: How to change my background on WebEx
column3: I want to change my video background in cisco webex
answer:
Before You Join
Click Change Background and then do one of the following:
- To blur your surroundings while remaining in focus, click Blur.
- To use a default virtual background, click the one you want.
- To use your own image for the virtual background, tap the + icon.
It is recommended that you use an image that's 1280 × 720 pixels in size or larger. Images must be in the .jpg or .png format.

During a Meeting
In your self-view window, click the Video options icon, choose Change Virtual Background, and do one of the following:
- To blur your surroundings while remaining in focus, click Blur.
- To use a default virtual background, click the one you want.
- To use your own image for the virtual background, tap the + icon.
When you're ready for everyone in the meeting to see your background, click Apply. Webex remembers your selection for your next meeting.

query: How to share screen in cisco WebEx
column3: I want to share content in cisco webex
answer:
To share content during a meeting, from the meeting control panel, select Share.
Select which window you want to share.
Go to the Share menu for more sharing options.

query: How to record a cisco WebEx meeting
column3: I want to record a meeting in cisco webex
answer:
While in your meeting, click Record, and then Record to record right away. You and your participants see a red icon at the top right of your window when recording is in process.
When the meeting ends, you can find your recording on the Recordings > My Recorded Meetings page of your Webex site. If you recorded in the cloud, when the meeting ends, you receive an email with the recording link. Depending on file size and bandwidth, it can take up to 24 hours to receive your recording.

query: How to start a group conversation in Google Hangouts
column3: I want to create a group chat in google hangouts
answer:
Go to hangouts.google.com or open classic Hangouts in Gmail.

query: How to start a group call in a group message in google hangouts
column3: I want to start a group vall in google hangouts
answer:
Go to hangouts.google.com or open the app from the sidebar in Gmail.
Select a group to call from the Hangouts list or create a new group.

Hangouts automatically adds a Meet link to your message. Click Send  to share the link and invite the group to the Google Meet video call.

query: How to add a person to a hangouts group

answer:
When someone is added to a group, they can access past messages in the conversation. 
Go to hangouts.google.com or open Hangouts in Gmail.
Select a group conversation.
Click People People.
At the bottom, click Add people. 
Type the name or email address of the person you want to add.
Click Add people.

query: Is zoom free to use
column3: What are the zoom payment options
answer:
There are 3 types of users:
Basic: A basic user is a user without a paid license. Basic users can be on Basic (free) plans, as well as paid plans such as Pro or Business. A basic user on a Basic plan can host meetings with up to 100 participants. A basic user on a paid account inherits the account's default meeting capacity, such as a Business account's default meeting capacity of 300. If 3 or more participants join, the meeting will time out after 40 minutes. They cannot utilize user and account add-ons such as large meeting, webinar, or conference room connector.

Licensed: A licensed user is a paid account user who can host unlimited meetings on the public cloud. By default, they can host meetings with up to 100 participants and large meeting licenses are available for additional capacity. Licensed users have these additional features available:
- Customize Personal Meeting ID
- Record to the Zoom cloud
- Be an alternative host
- Assign others to schedule and schedule on behalf of
- Utilize account add-ons such as conference room connector
- Be assigned user add-ons such as large meeting, webinar, or personal audio conference
- Customize Personal Link, if on a business or education account

On-prem: An on-prem user is a paid account who can host unlimited meetings with the on-premise meeting connector. On-prem users have these additional features:
- Customize Personal Meeting ID
- Use the recording connector, if configured for their account
- Be an alternative host
- Assign others to schedule and schedule on behalf of
- Utilize account add-ons such as room connector
- Be assigned user add-ons such as large meeting, webinar, or personal audio conference
- Customize Personal Link, if on a business or education account

You can find your user type on your profile page. If you are an admin or account owner, you can view user types for all users under your account on the User Management page.

query: Is microsoft teams free
column3: Do you have to pay for microsoft teams
answer:
Yes! The free version of Teams includes the following:
- Unlimited chat messages and search.
- Built-in online meetings and audio and video calling for individuals and groups, with a duration of up to 60 minutes per meeting or call. For a limited time, you can meet for up to 24 hours.
- 10 GB of team file storage plus 2 GB per person for personal storage.
- Integrated, real-time content creation with Office apps like Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and OneNote.
- Unlimited app integrations with more than 650 business apps to choose from, including Adobe Sign, Evernote, and Trello.
- Ability to communicate and collaborate with anyone inside or outside your organization, backed by Microsoft’s secure, global infrastructure.

query: How to show my profile picture when my video is off in zoom

query: What are the zoom keyboard shortcuts
column3: I want to edit keyboard shortcuts in zoom
answer:
You can view and edit keyboard shortcuts in your Keyboard Shortcuts settings.
Sign in to the Zoom desktop client.
Click your profile picture then click Settings.
Click Keyboard Shortcuts.
The keyboard shortcuts will appear.

Editing shortcuts
You can edit a shortcut by clicking on the shortcut and then pressing the shortcut key that you would like to use. 
Some of the shortcuts can be used as global shortcuts, meaning they will work even when Zoom is not in focus. To enable a shortcut globally, check the option next to the shortcut.

query: How to use dark mode in zoom
column3: I want to use zoom dark mode on my windows or mac
answer:
Zoom dark mode for Windows
The Zoom desktop app doesn't offer dark mode, but you can force dark mode if you join a Zoom meeting using Chrome. To give it a try, visit chrome://flags/#enable-force-dark and choose one of the non-default options. Select 'Enabled with selected inversion of everything'. Save any work in other browser tabs and click 'Re-launch' to activate the change'.
To reverse the change, simply go back to chrome://flags/#enable-force-dark and change the setting back to 'Default', then re-launch the browser.

Zoom dark mode for macOS
The Zoom app for macOS respects your operating system's settings, so to activate dark mode you can simply open your system preferences, select 'General' and select the 'Dark' appearance option. This will change the look of your whole OS, and all supported apps.
To reverse the change and return macOS to its previous look, simply repeat the process and select the 'Light' appearance option.

query: How do I join a Microsoft Teams meeting

answer: Go to the meeting invite and select Join Microsoft Teams Meeting, that'll open a web page, where you'll see two choices: Download the Windows app and Join on the web instead. If you join on the web, you can use either Microsoft Edge or Google Chrome. Your browser may ask if it's okay for Teams to use your mic and camera. Be sure to allow it so you'll be seen and heard in your meeting.  Enter your name and choose your audio and video settings. If the meeting room (or another device that's connected to the meeting) is nearby, choose Audio off to avoid disrupting. Select Phone audio if you want to listen to the meeting on your mobile phone.  Then select join now, where you will be admitted to the meeting lobby.

query: How to use virtual backgrounds in Google Meet
column3: I want virtual backgrounds in Google Meet
answer: Before a video call: Go to Google Meet, select a meeting > Change Background (bottom right of self view) > Join Now. During a video call: click More (three vertical dots at the bottom) > Change Background.

query: Does Google Meet have reactions
column3: I want to react in Google Meet
answer: You can't do that at this moment, but you can try by installing extensions from Chrome Web Store

query: Where to change sound settings in Google Meet
column3: I want to change the volume in Google Meet
answer: Go to https://meet.google.com/ (before a meeting) or select More (during a meeting), select Settings > Audio > Microphone or Speakers > Test (optional) > Done

query: How to enter a Google Meet meeting with a different email
column3: I keep entering Google Meet with the same email address
answer: Click on the profile picture in the Google Meet tab, choose the account you want to switch too and Add An Account if it's not there

query: How to conduct polls in Google Meet
column3: I want to make polls in Google Meet
answer: In a meeting, click Activities (top-right corner) > Polls > Start a poll > Enter questions and add options > Launch (to post your poll) or Save (to post it later)

query: How to show poll results in Google Meet
column3: I want to show poll results in Google Meet
answer: In a meeting, click Activities (top-right corner) > Polls > Switch on Show everyone the results

query: How to close a poll in Google Meet
column3: I want to close a poll in Google Meet
answer: In a meeting, click Activities (top-right corner) > Polls > End the poll

query: How to view poll results later in Google Meet
column3: I want to view poll results after meeting in Google Meet
answer: After a meeting, the moderator is emailed a report for any polls conducted in the meeting. The report includes the names and answers of the meeting participants. Open the poll report email and click the report attachment.

query: How to find a meeting time that works for everyone
column3: I want to find the best meeting time
answer: Suggested times feature: In Google Calendar, create a new event, or open an existing event  > Add guests (if you haven’t already done so) and then click Suggested times > Choose a time in the resulting list. Find a time feature (If the other guests have shared their calendar with you): In Google Calendar, create a new event, or open an existing event > Add guests (if you haven’t already done so) and then click the tab Find a time > Use the arrows at the top to navigate between days > Once you have found a time, click the area within the calendar grid > Save

query: Does Google Meet have filters
column3: Where can I apply filters in Google Meet?
answer: No, but if you still want filters, you can download Snap Camera at https://yourstack.com/products/TheSnapCamera. Before your next Google Meet call, go to Settings > Video > and change the source to Snap Camera.

query: How to attach files in Google Meet
column3: I want to send files in Google Meet
answer: In a Meet video call, in the lower-left corner, click the meeting name > Attachments, then select the files

query: Does Google Meet have breakout rooms
column3: I want to have breakout rooms in Google Meet
answer: Yes. In a Meet video call, click Activites in the top right > Breakout rooms. Choose a number of breakout rooms (up to 100). To manually move people into different rooms, you can one of the followings: (1) Enter the participant’s name directly into a breakout room, (2) Click the participant’s name. Hold down the mouse, drag the name, and then drop it into another breakout room (3)To randomly mix up the groups again, click Shuffle. Click Open rooms to finish.

query: How can I raise hands in Google Meet
column3: I want to raise hands in Google Meet
answer: Scroll to the bottom of the screen and then click Hand raise

query: How many people can a Google Meet meeting have
column3: I want to know the max number of people in a Google Meet meeting
answer: 100 participants

query: How to share screen in Google Meet
column3: I want to share my screen in Google Meet
answer: In a Meet video call, on the bottom, select Present now. Select Your entire screen, A window, or A tab. Select Share

query: Can many people share screens at the same time in Google Meet
column3: I want to share my screen at the same time as someone else
answer: Only one person may share their screen at a time

query: How to record a meeting in Google Meet
column3: I want to record my Google Meet meeting
answer: In a meeting, click More (three vertical dots) > Record meeting. Wait for the recording to start.

query: What are the differences between Zoom and Google Meet
column3: Compare Zoom and Google Meet
answer: The basic plans of both platforms are free, can handle up to 100 people in a meeting, and with only 1 host. Maximum time of a Zoom meeting is 40 min, while that of Google Meet is 60 min.

query: How to annotate in Zoom
column3: I want to draw or annotate in Zoom
answer: Sign into Zoom web portal and go to the Settings tab. For a single account, in navigation, click Account Management > Account Settings (for a single account); for a group of users, in navigation, clickUser Management > Group Management, choose the group name, then click the Settings tab. Then click Meeting tab > under In Meeting (basic), enable Annotation. If a verification dialog displays, click Turn On to verify the change.

query: How to join a Zoom meeting from web browser
column3: I don't want to download Zoom
answer: Sign into Zoom web portal and go to the Settings tab. For a single account, in navigation, click Account Management > Account Settings (for a single account); for a group of users, in navigation, clickUser Management > Group Management, choose the group name, then click the Settings tab. Click Meeting tab >  enable Show a "Join from your browser" Link. If a verification dialog displays, choose Turn On to verify the change.

query: Can I attend multiple Google Meet
column3: I want to join many Google Meet meetings
answer: Yes, you should be able to join multiple meetings at the same time. I would expect the main limitation would be your computer's processing power and your bandwidth.

query: How to automatically mute myself in Google Meet
column3: I don't want to use my mic in Google Meet
answer: Before you join any meeting on Google Meet, you might have noticed a ‘Join Screen’ which checks for your Mic and Cam before joining. But if we are already disabling Mic and Camera by default, there is no point in keeping the ‘Join Screen’ as well. You can do that by installing an extension called Google Meet Enhanced Suite. This extension is a one-stop destination for many features on the Google Meet like the push to talk, dark mode, timer, PIP mode, muting other participants for you, etc along with auto disabling mic and cam and also disabling the join screen.

query: How to automatically turn of my camera in Google Meet
column3: I don't want to turn my camera on in Google Meet
answer: As soon as you run the Google Meet app, your camera will turn on and you’ll likely see yourself. If you want to make sure that your camera isn’t recording, tap or click the camera icon in the bottom part of the screen.

query: Can I use a whiteboard in Google Meet
column3: I need whiteboard in Google Meet
answer: In the video call at the bottom, click More options More > Whiteboard. To create a new Jamboard, click Start a new whiteboard. To open an existing Jamboard from your drive, shared drives, or computer, click Choose from Drive.

query: How to change camera settings in Google Meet
column3: I want to change my video settings in Google Meet
answer: Go to https://meet.google.com/. Click Settings > Video. Choose a setting you want to change: Camera, Send resolution, or Receive Resolution.

query: How to turn on Google Meet notifications
column3: I want to receive notifications from Google Meet
answer: On your computer, open Chrome. At the top right, click More > Settings. Under Privacy and security, click Site settings. Click Notifications. Select the Meet entry and click More > Allow.

query: Why my video quality is bad in Google Meet
column3: I want to improve my video quality in Google Meet
answer: Poor video quality can be due to network issues or insufficient lighting in the room. To identify the problem: Make sure that the sender and receiver devices have enough CPU power and memory; Narrow down the issue as much as possible, such as to a location or network segment; Identify if the issue is on the sender or receiver side; Reduce bandwidth usage by setting the default for video quality.

query: How to mute background noise on Google Meet
column3: I don't want background noise in Google Meet
answer: If before a video call: go to meet.google.com and select a video call. Before you join, click More > Settings > Audio. Turn on Noise cancellation > Join now. If during a video call: click More > Setitngs > Audio, and turn on Noise cancellation.

query: How to save a Google Meet chat
column3: I want to save the chat in Google Meet
answer: You can't save chat. If the teacher is recording the meeting then chat will be saved.

query: How to see participants list in Google Meet
column3: I want to see who attend the Google Meet meeting
answer: You have to enable attendance tracking by 2 ways: during a meeting or with Google Calendar. First way: click Menu (three vertical dots) > Settings > Host Controls, then Enable Attendance tracking. Second way: create a new event > Add Google Meet video conferencing or click an existing meeting > Edit event. Click Change conference Settings. Check the box next to "Attendance tracking" > Save. Finish setting up your event if you just create one. You will receive a report through email after the meeting.

query: Is there a Google Meet app on desktop
column3: I want to download Google Meet
answer: Google Meet only have mobile apps.

query: Is Google Meet free
column3: Do I have to pay for Google Meet
answer: Yes, but you won't have these features: dial-in phone numbers, meeting recording saved to Google Drive, hand raise, polls and Q&A, breakout rooms, attendance reports, intelligent noise cancellation, and live streaming in-domain.

query: Are there Google Meet discounts
column3: Can I have discounts for Google Meet
answer: Yes, if your organization is non-profit, you can use Google Workspace for free.
